title: Kannai Nambathey Song Lyrics Ninaithadhai Mudippavan
stanzas:
Kannai nambaathe
unnai yaemaatrum
unnai yaemaatrum
nee kaanum thotram
unmai illaadhadhu

arivai nee nambu
ullam thelivaagum
adaiyaalam kaattum
poiye sollaadhadhu

podum poi siraiyai
kilithuvidum kaalam
poiyum appodhu
meiyaana kolam.

Kannai nambaathe
unnai yaemaatrum
nee kaanum thotram
unmai illaadhadhu
unmai illaadhadhu

Om murugaa endru solli
uchcharikkum saamigale
rudhraacha poonaigalaai
vazhureenga

en manathai naan arivaen
en uravai naan maravaen
edhuvaana podhilum
aagattumae.

nandri maravaadha
nalla manam podhum
endrum adhuvae en
moolathanam aagum.

annai nambaathe
unnai yaemaatrum
unnai yaemaatrum
nee kaanum thotram
unmai illaadhadhu

arivai nee nambu
ullam thelivaagum
adaiyaalam kaattum
poiye sollaadhadhu
